question: International No Diet Day was observed on __________.
explanation: International No Diet Day (INDD) was observed all over the world on May 6th. INDD is a celebration of body acceptance, fat acceptance and body shape diversity. Its symbol is a light blue ribbon. The first International No Diet Day was celebrated in 1992 in the UK. This day promotes a healthy life style. It focuses on health at any size and in creating awareness on dangers of dieting.
